name: Card Duel Fantasy
description:
Card Duel Fantasy is a 2D turn-based game with a variety of resources and battlers to obtain. With each level the game gets progressively harder, allowing you to gather rarest cards possible.

Update logs:

25/04/2022
New resources have been added. (over 30+)
Pro battle league has been added! (3 additional cards)
Resource production mechanic is added!
Shop balancing is made.

27/04/2022
Epic battle league has been added! (3 additional cards)
Additional character dialogues with personality changes are added!

30/04/2022
Master league has been added! (3 additional cards)
Time required for resource production has been altered.
Balance changes for several cards have been made.

In case of bugs, please contact blasphemyco.dcf@gmail.com

If you'd like to support Card Duel Fantasy, refer to the following link: http://patreon.com/BlasphemyCO
